}}'''Efe''' is one of the nine [[Skin#Default skins|default]] skins [[player]]s can use in ''[[Minecraft]]'', and the fifth to be introduced. They were first introduced in the [[Mojang cinematics|cinematic]] [[The Wild Update: What Will You Uncover?|''What Will You Uncover?'']] with [[Sunny]], and has since become one of the main protagonists of the franchise.

== Appearance ==
Efe is typically depicted with slim arms, and brown skin. They have a distinctive purple haircut, white eyes, garnet pupils, and brown lips. Notably, Efe is adorned with many gold trimmed items, including a gold earring, gold bracelet, gold belt buckle, and gold trimmed boots. Their outfit is a bluish-white cardigan on top of a black blouse, with high raised dark purple leather pants.

In the [[Character Creator|character creator]], Efe has approximately eight items, the most of any default character.

== Trivia ==

* In the [[YouTube]] short ''[[WHAT WOULD YOU DO?]]'', Efe appears to have a voice, speaking with a masculine, young voice.<ref name=":0">[https://www.minecraft.net/ru-ru/article/minecraft-snapshot-25w34a Minecraft Snapshot 25w34b | Minecraft] (view source code for the description)</ref>
** In another short, ''[[FIRST TIME IN THE DEEP DARK]]'', Efe is depicted with a gruff voice.<ref>{{YouTube link|EemA78bWbRc|FIRST TIME IN DEEP DARK|Minecraft|July 9, 2024}}</ref>
*Despite not being usable as a skin in the map, [[Planet Earth III]]'s marketing uses Efe.<ref>{{Mcnet|planet-earth-iii-perspectives|Planet Earth III: Perspectives|January 16, 2024|Cristina Anderca}}</ref>
*In June 2025, Efe appeared on a button for the [[Marketplace]], promoting the introduction of the dynamic world [https://www.minecraft.net/en-us/marketplace/pdp/poggy/better-on-bedrock-1.1.1/6c3a6979-dc77-41c6-b19e-0071dabedf71 Better on Bedrock] to [[Marketplace Pass]].
*Efe is the only default skin for which Mojang uses the pronoun "they" in the descriptions of images on [[minecraft.net]].<ref>https://www.minecraft.net/en-us/article/minecraft-1-20-3-pre-release-3 (view source code of the page for the description)</ref>
